name: YouTube Short
primary_goal_vibe: Fast discovery, reach expansion, and top-of-funnel growth through short-form vertical video.
tone_preference: Fast, direct, energetic, and hook-driven. Less explanatory, more immediate.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: The first 1–2 seconds of the video must communicate the hook visually or verbally. The title should reinforce the main idea or curiosity. Description is optional and minimal.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Title: short hook or statement. Optional description: 1–2 short lines of context or CTA.
copy_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Title under 50 characters. Description minimal or omitted.
cta_examples: Watch the full video on the channel
Share this with someone who needs it

on_screen_text_guidelines.primary_role: Deliver the hook, context, and clarity immediately for sound-off viewing.
best_practices: Hook text in the first second
Sync text with speech and cuts

hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Use topic and niche hashtags. Avoid unrelated trend tags.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag collaborators only if they appear in the Short.

technical_constraints.safe_area_note: Keep text and subjects centered to avoid interface overlays.

disallowed_practices: Slow intros with logos before the hook
Trying to cover multiple topics in one Short
Reposting horizontal clips without vertical optimization
Clickbait hooks unrelated to the actual content
